long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Plugin is designed to speed up copying of PR information to post to external sources. It takes the PR url and pr title and copies them to the clipboard in the format:

[PR Link] - [PR title]

You can either click the PR title on the github page or use the widget in the extension to do this.
